APR FC vs AS Kigali

APR FC 0-1 AS Kigali

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Eric Tony Ukurikiyimfura

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

16:58

AS Kigali iteye intambwe nziza

AS Kigali itsinze APR FC mu mukino ubanza waberaga kuri Stade ya Kigali ku gitego 1-0. Ikipe y'Umujyi wa Kigali izakira umukino wo kwishyura uzabera kuri iki kibuga ku Cyumweru isabwa kunganya gusa cyangwa igatsindwa ku kinyuranyo cy'igitego kimwe.

16:56

Umukino urarangiye

APR FC 0-1 AS Kigali
Marines FC 0-1 Rayon Sports FC
Gasogi United 1-0 Rwamagana City FC
Hope FC 2-2 Etincelles FC

16:54

90+1' Gusimbuza kwa AS Kigali

Ntate Djumaini yinjiye mu kibuga asimbura Kalanda Frank utahiriwe n'umukino wo kuri uyu wa Kane.

16:52

90' Igitego cya AS Kigali

Nshimiyimana Marc Govin atsindiye AS Kigali igitego cyiza ku mupira ateye ugonga umutambiko w'izamu umanukira mu izamu.. Umusifuzi wo ku ruhande yemeje ko umupira warenze umurongo.

16:50

89' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Kapiteni wa AS kigali Ntamuhanga Tumaini ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo nyuma yo kutishimira icyemezo cy'abasifuzi ku ikosa rikorewe kuri Niyomugabo Claude imbere y'intebe y'abasimbura.

16:47

87' APR FC ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Nshuti Savio Dominique azamukanye umupira awutanga kuri Sugira Ernest uteye mu izamu uca ku ruhande. Bwari uburyo ikipe ya APR FC ibonye nyuma y'uko Fabrice ananiwe kugera ku mupira.

16:41

79' APR FC isigaye ari abakinnyi 10 mu kibuga

Imanishimwe Emmanuel yagize ikibazo aravunika nyuma yo gukandagirwa n'umukinnyi wa AS Kigali. APR FC irasigara ari abakinnyi 10 mu kibuga kuko yamaze gusimbuza abakinnyi bose.

16:40

78' Coup-franc ya APR FC

Nininahazwe Fabrice akiniye nabi Nshuti Savio Dominique, ikosa rihanwe na Iranzi, Migi ananirwa gushyira umupira mu izamu, Kalanda awushyira muri koruneri itagize icyo itanga.

16:36

Ku bindi bibuga

Marines FC 0- 1 Rayon Sports (Ulimwengu)

Gasogi United 1-0 Rwamagana City (Habimana Yves)

Hope FC 2-1 Etincelles

16:34

74' AS Kigali ihushije uburyo bwiza

Benedata Janvier ateye umupira ntiyawufatisha neza, usubira inyuma ugera kuri Ntamuhanga Tumaini uteye umupira ukomeye uca ku ruhande rw'izamu.

16:31

71' Gusimbuza kwa AS Kigali

Nininahazwe Fabrice bakunze kwita Messi asimbuye Kapiteni waAS Kigali, Murengezi Rodrigue.

16:26

66' Gusimbuza kwa APR FC

Danny Usengimana asimbuwe na Sugira Ernest wari umaze iminsi adakina kubera imvune.

16:25

65' Coup-franc ya AS Kigali

Benedata Janvier akiniwe nabi na Nshuti Savio Dominique inyuma gato y'urubuga rw'amahina, ikosa yihaniye umupira ufatwa neza na Kimenyi Yves.

16:21

59' Coup-franc ya APR FC

APR FC iri gusatira cyane muri iyi mikino. Hakizimana Muhadjiri acenze Nova Bayama na Ntamuhanga Tumaini bamukinira nabi, ikosa rihanwe AS Kigali yirwanaho, abakinnyi bayo bakuraho umupira.

16:13

51' Igitego cyanzwe

Omborenga Fitina akinannye na Muhadjiri inshuro ebyiri, uwa mbere awuhaye Muhadjiri awutera mu izamu ugarurwa n'ipoto mu gihe undi awushyize mu izamu umusifuzi wo ku ruhande avuze ko habayeho kurarira.

16:10

48' APR FC ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Hakizimana Muhadjiri ateye ishoti rikomeye rikuwemo na Bate Shamiru umupira ujya muri koruneri. APR FC yongeye kubona ubundi buryo, Mangwende ateye umupira ujya hanze mu gihe Muhadjiri ateye undi mupira ufatwa na Bate Shamiru.

16:06

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

AS kigali itangije igice cya kabiri, umupira uruhukira ku munyezamu Kimenyi Yves wa APR FC

16:05

Gusimbuza kwa APR FC

Omborenga Fitina yinjiye mu kibuga asimbura Imran Nshimiyimana, Iranzi Jean Claude asimbura Shaffy.

15:51

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

15:47

45' Iminota ibiri y'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane yerekanye iminota ibiri y'inyongera hano kuri Stade ya Kigali. Amakipe yombi akomeje kwishakisha.

15:47

44' AS Kigali iri gusatira cyane

AS Kigali imaze iminota isaga itanu yihariye umupira. Ishimwe Kevin, Benedata Janvier na Nova Bayama bakomeje gushaka aho bemenera ngo batsindire ikipe yabo igitego muri uyu mukino.

15:42

39' AS Kigali ihushije igitego

Nova Bayama ateye urutambi rw'ishoti umunyezamu Kimenyi Yves arikuramo umupira ugonga ipoto y'izamu ugiye kurenga umurongo Kimenyi arawisubiza. Abakinnyi ba AS Kigali bibwiraga ko warenze umurongo.

15:37

35' Amakipe yombi ari gukinira mu kibuga hagati

Abakinnyi b'impande zombi bakomeje gukinira mu kibuga hagati. Yaba APR FC na AS Kigali, abakinnyi bari guhererekanya ariko gutera mu izamu ni ikibazo

15:30

28' Koruneri ya AS Kigali

Imanishimwe Emmanuel yibwiraga ko Ishimwe Kevin yaraririye, uyu mukinnyi wa AS Kigali atera ishoti rikomeye rikozweho na Niyonzima Ally, umupira ujya muri koruneri. Ally, Rusheshangoga na Shaffy ni bo bari gukina mu bwugarizi bwa APR FC.

15:27

24' APR FC ihushije igitego

Ku mupira wa Imanishimwe Emmanuel wari umaze kurenzwa na Marc Govin, Muhadjiri ateye koruneri, umupira ushyirwaho umutwe na Niyonzima Ally, uramutenguha uca hejuru y'izamu rya AS Kigali.

15:22

20' Gusatira kwa AS Kigali

Nshimiyimana Marc Govin ahawe umupira na Ishimwe Kevin, ahindura umupira mwiza mu izamu, ushyirwa muri koruneri na Niyonzima Ally washoboraga kwitsinda igitego.

15:22

20' Gusatira kwa AS Kigali

Nshimiyimana Marc Govin ahawe umupira na Ishimwe Kevin, ahindura umupira mwiza mu izamu, ushyirwa muri koruneri na Niyonzima Ally washoboraga kwitsinda igitego.

15:16

14' APR FC yari ibonye penaliti

Umusifuzi wo hagati ahisemo kubyihorera n'ubwo myugariro wa AS Kigali akoze umupira wari utewe na Usengimana Danny bari mu rubuga rw'amahina.

15:13

11' Gusimbuza kwa AS Kigali

Ishimwe Kevin yinjiye mu kibuga asimbura Ssentongo Farouq wavunitse.

15:11

9' Umukino uhagaze gato

Ssentongo Saifi Farouq wakiniye APR FC na Bugesera FC ubu akaba ari muri AS Kigali yicaye hasi aho agize imvune nyuma yo gukorerwa ikosa mukanya kashize. Umutoza wa AS Kigali abwiye Ishimwe Kevin ko yitegura gusimbura.

15:09

7' Coup-franc ya AS Kigali

Rusheshangoga Michel akiniye nabi Nova Bayama ahagana ku rubuga rw'amahina mu ruhande, ikosa rihanwe na Nova Bayama uteye umupira ugenda hasi ujya hanze.

15:06

4' Gusatira kwa APR FC

Nyuma y'ikosa ryari rikozwe na Ssentongo Saifi, APR FC ibonye uburyo bwiza ku mupira Imanishimwe Emmanuel ahaye Muhadjiri, atera ishoti rikomeye rinyuze hejuru y'izamu.

15:04

2' Coup-franc ya APR FC

Murengezi Rodrigue akiniye nabi Songayingabo Shaffy,ikosa rihanwe na Hakizimana Muhadjiri, Bate Shamiru asubizayo umupira akoresheje ibipfunsi.

15:02

Umukino uratangiye

Umusifuzi atangije umukino. Danny Usengimana ateye umupira wa mbere awutanga kuri Hakizimana Muhadjiri.

14:53

Abakinnyi ba AS Kigali bishyushya

14:51

Abakinnyi ba APR FC bishyushya

14:44

Abakinnyi bitabajwe ku mpande zombi

AS Kigali: Shamiru Bate, Murengezi Rodrigue, Niyomugabo Claude, Rurangwa Mossi, Nsabimana Eric, Benedata Janvier, Ntamuhanga Tumaini, Nshimiyimana Marc Govin, Ssentongo Farouq, Nova Bayama na Kalanda Frank.

Umutoza: Mateso Jean De Dieu

APR FC: Kimenyi Yves, Mugiraneza Jean Baptiste, Rusheshangoga Michel, Imanishimwe Emmanuel, Niyonzima Ally, Songayingabo Shaffy, Nshimiyimana Amran, Nkinzingabo Fiston, Nshuti Dominique Savio, Hakizimana Muhadjiri na Usengimana Danny.

Umutoza: Mulisa Jimmy


Umutoza mukuru wa APR FC Zlatko Krmpotic ararwaye, Mulisa ni we uza gutoza uyu mukino.

14:39

Abakinnyi batemerewe gukina iyi mikino ibanza

Etoile de lâ€™est FC 1-2 Police FC

14:37

Ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo

Tubahaye ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo hagiye kubera umukino ubanza wa 1/8 cy'igikombe cy'Amahoro hagati ya APR FC na AS Kigali. APR FC yasezereye Rwamagana City FC mu ijonjora ribanza mu gihe AS Kigali yazamutse iri mu makipe yatsinzwe bike nyuma yo gusezererwa na Rayon Sports.
